CustomField.description: Flag indicates if an RMA is always required or an RMA is implied when this warranty is used to entitle a customer. This flag does not drive any functionality in ServiceMax and is for informational purposes only
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Flag indicates if an RMA is always required or an RMA is implied when this warranty is used to entitle a customer. This flag does not drive any functionality in ServiceMax and is for informational purposes only
CustomField.label: RMA Required
